Articles.Content: Recently, i have had the desire to get to the outer Kerbol system faster than before. Most of the rockets i launch explode, don't have enough Delta-V to get there, or simply just crash at some point in the mission. I am now looking to a Kraken drive as an alternate mode of propulsion. (Since i play on the Xbox One, 1.2 hasn't came to the console edition yet. So any working k-drive from before 1.2 is good on the console)

Good for you. What exactly is the purpose of this thread, though? Are you looking for existing designs or ideas to make your own? And I should warn you that kraken drives work strangely and may not function on different platforms.

The only consistent kraken drive I know of at this point is the ladder drive. It's a bit trickier to use than rockets, but I'll put this link to an old thread here in case you find it useful/entertaining.

The only one in this thread capable of interstellar flight would be the one in this post:

It's an older post, so you'll see the broken Imgur galleries. Just click the imgur icon on the top left of these to go to a still working version on the imgur web page.

Alternatively, if you want to throw some pictures of your craft my way, I could give a shot at helping you get the explosions out of it. No guarantee though, I'm still awash in exploding craft myself! Ever onwards.
